EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Assessor Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Happy New Year from the TCS Team!
Thanks for expressing your interest in volunteering alongside our Staffing Team as a Youth Assessor!
What the job entails:
Youth Assessors get the chance to help directly shape what NCS looks like! Working alongside our Staffing Team, you will have to opportunity to help assess and pick staff that work on our NCS Progrmme. Last year our team assessed for 3,500 roles across the country and we want your help this year!
Being a Youth Assessor also comes with lots of benefits which include helping you build on many skills such as:
Communication Analysing Teamwork Self confidence!
A job role like this will also receive great recognition from universities and future employers, so it will look great on your CV and personal statement!
If you would like any more information about this job role please find the job description attached.
Training for Youth Assessors will take place at The Challenge Office in Waterloo. Address: Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ
There are three dates available for this training day so please pick the date that is most suitable for you to attend. You will only need to attend one training session but it is essential to the role that you attend this day.
Tickets are available below. Please choose ONE date: Wednesday 20th January Monday 15th February Friday 19th February
Feel free to email us if you have any questions and we look forward to seeing you soon!
Best Wishes,
The Core Grad Team
